captions.text: [Music]
[Applause]
could have been
worse let&#39;s be serious viewer why are
you here I already told you my opinion
on this remake will be [ __ ] useless
to you I&#39;ve got too many nostalgic
associations with the OG Silent Hill 2 I
played it 90,000 times back when I still
had my hair and probably at least once
with my hand down my trousers you might
as well ask a dog for an objective
review of bacon if you want an unbiased
perspective go find some credulous young
person who never played the original and
doesn&#39;t know Pyramid Head from Hanging
Gardens of Babylon foot and ask if they
like the Remake I suspect a lot of what
they like will be what was copied
directly from the original story monster
design environment design music Ambient
sound all mostly control seed character
design as well although Eddie now looks
like Pat Oswalt Midway through
transforming into Slimer and
Ghostbusters and Angela looks like she&#39;s
storing nuts in her cheeks for the
winter the opening prologue Forest hike
and cemeter cut scene are more or less
recreated exactly albeit now with a
Resident Evil 4 style over the shoulder
camera which I&#39;m not a fan of because it
removes that sense of emotional distance
that was a big part of the original&#39;s
Vibe and also makes it seem like I&#39;m
inordinately fixated on James
sunderland&#39;s bottom but in that moment I
thought hell if all blueba team are
doing is recreating Silent Hill 2 Shot
for shot with modern graphics and
gameplay then there are worse things
Lord knows since the medium and layers
of fear 2 I&#39;ve trusted blueba team&#39;s
original ideas as much as I trust
Michael J fox to transport a wedding
cake but then I reached the end of the
opening hike where I found a locked gate
and a key hunt puzzle in a nearby garage
and that wasn&#39;t an original ruin forever
table flip okay let&#39;s be serious for
real Z&#39;s now the guiding principle
behind this remake seems to be take the
original Jam the air pump from digdug up
the ass of each individual section and
pump till it&#39;s about three times longer
every boss fight is three phases now the
Labyrinth is now three labyrinths and I
fail to see the point unless it&#39;s to
meet the Modern Standard triaa quota for
useless fannying about so the opening
Town section as you go through a brand
new puzzle sequence where you have to
find and glue a record back together and
put it and a coin in a jukebox somehow I
missed the coin in my initial sweep so I
found myself frustratedly double
checking the 19 cash registers I&#39;d
encountered thus far and the Eerie
atmospheric experience of a loone man
unwittingly descending into horror
became me running up and down the street
smashing windows and payones with a big
bit of wood yelling you couldn&#39;t have
just had a coin on you James is this why
you parked so far out of town cuz you
forgot to bring change for the meters
look the OG wasn&#39;t above reproach it had
some dumb inventory puzzles too but the
solution was not to add more of the
[ __ ] the Remake even has a slightly
cocky dig at one of the particularly
dumb ones you find a trapo and a
horseshoe covered in melted wax as if to
say yeah like that would work but people
who live in glass houses Luber team
probably shouldn&#39;t get undressed during
daylight hours some of the dumb puzzles
have just been changed laterally in ways
I find bewildering like in the OG at one
point you fish something out of a drain
with a hook on the end of a bit of hair
that was the only thing in an empty box
locked with five different mechanisms in
a room belonging to a grief stricken man
whose daughter died yes one wonders why
James couldn&#39;t use a random bit of
string but you got a little Side Story
out of it and it was all on theme
meanwhile remake has the fish hook drain
puzzle as well except you use a random
bit of string the box with the five
locks is still there but as part of an
entirely different puzzle and it turns
out to be actually empty and then James
gives the camera a stupid look as if to
say don&#39;t got me again spooky town if
blueba team&#39;s intent was to broadly
speaking recreate Silent Hill 2 then I&#39;d
say they [ __ ] up because the Vibes are
off the town seems more aggressively
hostile towards James with monsters
literally smashing through walls to get
to him like the [ __ ] Kool-Aid man
where in the OG it was more of a cold
impersonal oh you still here Lial space
sort of vibe where the monsters were
just kind of hanging out and the most
intense boss fight was Pyramid Head
walking slowly around an empty room
possibly in sege of an extremely sturdy
hat standand was that better not
necessarily I do like the more intense
combat experience the way James can keep
wailing on Monsters long after they sto
moving occasionally making freaked out
noises like me noticing a spider in the
bath really helps emphasize his complete
lack of action protagonist credentials I
think the game&#39;s too generous with items
by the end I had enough Health drinks to
take a bath in the [ __ ] stuff and I&#39;m
both [ __ ] at dodging and prone to
pressing the heel button by mistake
because it used to be the map button and
I&#39;ve got the sense of direction of a
dude with an upturned wheelbarrow on his
head but the OG gave you too much stuff
as well I always took that as part of
the town&#39;s Mind Games have all the
health and ammo you can carry because
absolutely none of it&#39;s going to help
you mate but let&#39;s get serious really
for real Z&#39;s now if you&#39;re here because
you want my permission to like the
Silent Hill 2 remake then fine you have
it it&#39;s a perfectly good horror game
don&#39;t know how many points blueba team
get for copying someone else&#39;s homework
but if you did miss out on the original
it&#39;ll give you a nice filling horror
dinner meanwhile from my unashamedly
biased diard fans perspective the Remake
has done what modern remakes so often do
taken something unique and made it more
like everything else James feels flatter
as a character cuz he&#39;s played more as
generic mumbly standard protagonist man
with an ass like two textbooks on an
ironing board also I&#39;ve often lorded the
OG Silent Hill 2 for having next to no
jump scares it doesn&#39;t need them to give
you the Willies it effectively builds a
sense of cold oppressive background
Willies like after hours at the dildo
repair shop meanwhile the Silent Hill 2
remake has jump scares up the butt and I
don&#39;t like it when Willies jump up my
butt mannequin monsters suddenly
springing to life was scary at first but
after 90,000 [ __ ] times the returns
diminish somewhat and when you see that
used Band-Aid like flesh quivering in
anticipation behind a cat R for the
eenth time one&#39;s reaction becomes more
oh for crying out loud I told you I
don&#39;t want a subscription to kick to the
face monthly not for the first time I
might question the point of remaking
something that was already perfectly
good and once again the obvious answer
comes back that it&#39;s the good ones that
make money and it&#39;s not like we&#39;re in
this for Creative fulfillment or
anything hey you know what game does
have jump scares Silent Hill one why
didn&#39;t you remake that first that you
could improve upon cuz the plot was
cheesy the voice acting was like a table
read at the methadone clinic and the
graphics now look like a Lego dog turd
on the back of a rusty shovel or as
konami&#39;s Executive Suite would call it
[Music]
lunch this video was brought to you by
incog now you know like stealth games
but I really don&#39;t like the prolonged
high stake stealth game that browsing
the internet has become the moment you
step out from the Shadows read secure
websites you get spotted and riddled
with bullets read spam emails before you
can even get as far as the secret
documents read porn and that&#39;s just not
good game design fortunately if you sign
up with incy at inc.com secondwind and
use code secondwind for 60% off an
annual plan you can call incog up on
your secret communication device read
set up your account on its intuitive
dashboard and then watch with Glee as
they go around the enemy base read
Internet snapping the necks of all the
evil henchmen read getting your
information removed eval data Brokers
thus ensuring you can have peace of mind
as you enjoy your secret documents in
whatever manner most appeals to
reiterate go to incognit tocom
secondwind and use code second win to
get 60% off an annual plan because you
can&#39;t spell infiltration without
Filter Hey don&#39;t you dare skip to the
little gags at the end of the credits
madio those are for real fans who
appreciate us you can Jolly well sit
there and read the names of all these
patreon supporters who are good people
and have their lives together you know
if every single person watching this
gave just $1 a month to the patreon I&#39;d
never have to do ad reads again you know
the ad read the thing you just saw oh
don&#39;t tell me you skipped the ad read as
well Jesus [ __ ] Christ man what do
you think pays for this content won&#39;t
join the patreon won&#39;t watch the ads on
the ethical scale that&#39;s like 7 Deca
Hitlers
[Music]
[Applause]
